sys_remote_update_set.description: Create a new Task type table and form showing at least the following fields: Number, Business Service, Configuration Item, Change Request (Reference to the change_request table), Knowledge Checkbox, State (Open, In Progress, Complete), Impact, Assignment Group, Assigned to, Short Description and Description - On Change of the Change Request field, populate the current forms Short Description field with the value from the selected Change Request record. - Restrict the Configuration Item field to only pull in Application CIs - Hide the Impact field for non admin users - Utilize a GlideAjax call on change of Impact to 1 pull back the following Configuration Item attributes and append to the Description field: Name, Operational status, Owned by, Updated and Update by
sys_remote_update_set.name: al.newTable

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_6b5142cc2fa61410c1d95e492799b60c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AJAXReferenceHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>AJAXReferenceHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var AJAXReferenceHelper = Class.create();
AJAXReferenceHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getCIAttributes: function() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');
		var CIsysID = this.getParameter('sysparm_sysId');
		gr.get(CIsysID);
		gs.log('AJAXReferenceHelper');
		gs.log('CIsysID - ' + CIsysID);
		var answer = {};
		answer.name = gr.getDisplayValue('name');
		answer.operState = gr.getDisplayValue('operational_status');
		answer.ownedBy = gr.getDisplayValue('owned_by');
		answer.updatedOn = gr.getDisplayValue('sys_updated_on');
		answer.updatedBy = gr.getDisplayValue('sys_updated_by');
		return JSON.stringify(answer);
	},
	type: 'AJAXReferenceHelper'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-05 23:12:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>6b5142cc2fa61410c1d95e492799b60c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AJAXReferenceHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6b5142cc2fa61410c1d95e492799b60c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-05 23:12:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
